name: LCX
description:
LCX, the Liechtenstein Cryptoassets Exchange, aims to become one of the worldâ€™s first licensed and supervised security token exchanges. 

The initial product is LCX Terminal, a crypto trading desk to trade on major crypto exchanges within a single interface. In November 2018, LCX claims to have been granted a Business License of the Liechtenstein Ministry of Economic Affairs. 

LCX AG was found in April 2018 and is headquartered at the Principality of Liechtenstein.
